articles.description: By attempting to steal an election, President Donald Trump is waging a war against American democracy. So far, democracy is winning. But the damage he has inflicted on the country will not end with his presidency, writes Frida Ghitis.

articles.title: Fox News largely ignores record single-day coronavirus death toll

articles.author: Sandrine Amiel and Pierre Bairin, CNN
articles.title: French Senate report says government failed to heed mask stockpile warnings
articles.description: A new report from the French Senate alleges that the country's health policy authority failed to heed expert warnings about its stockpile of personal protective equipment, leaving it under-equipped for this year's outbreak of Covid-19.

articles.title: Trump backs Texas lawsuit seeking to invalidate millions of votes
